document.full_text: tennessee and kentucky turned over their supplies of a lethal injection drug to the u.s. drug enforcement administration, which is probing how the drug was imported, officials said on friday.
document.title: two more u.s. states turn over executions drug in probe
lines_and_colors: tennessee and kentucky turned over their supplies of a lethal injection drug to the u.s. drug enforcement administration, which is probing how the drug was imported, officials said on friday.
